verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice, Ye pure in heart, rejoice, give thanks, and sing; your festal banner wave on high, the cross of Christ your King.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice, give thanks, and sing!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Bright youth and snow-crowned age, both men and women, raise on high your free, exulting song, declare God's wondrous praise.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: With voice as full and strong As oceanâ€™s surging praise, Send forth the hymns our fathers loved, The psalms of ancient days.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: With all the angel choirs, With all the saints of earth, Pour out the strains of joy and bliss, True rapture, noblest mirth.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Still lift your standard high, Still march in firm array, As warriors through the darkness toil, Till dawns the golden day.
